thread.title: David Beckham Goes Snowboarding for the First Time as Son Brooklyn Suffers Scary Injury on the Slopes
thread.title_full: David Beckham Goes Snowboarding for the First Time as Son Brooklyn Suffers Scary Injury on the Slopes

author: Alex Ungerman
title: David Beckham Goes Snowboarding for the First Time as Son Brooklyn Suffers Scary Injury on the Slopes

organizations.name: first time as son brooklyn suffers scary injury

text: David Beckham Goes Snowboarding for the First Time as Son Brooklyn Suffers Scary Injury on the Slopes by Alex Ungerman 2:12   Instagram The Beckhams seem to be having a nice vacation -- despite Brooklyn's scary tumble at the end of a run! David Beckham went snowboarding for the first time with wife Victoria, and the couple's children, documenting their slope-filled day on Instagram. MORE: David Beckham Reveals He Renewed Wedding Vows With Victoria Beckham "Don't usually post so many but it's so beautiful up here plus having a special time so before anyone else sells pictures of the family I wanted you guys to see them first," the 41-year-old retired soccer star captioned the pic. "Btw my first time ever boarding or even on the slope." A post shared by David Beckham (@davidbeckham) on Feb 17, 2017 at 10:49am PST Beckham shared several more pics of his family, including Victoria, and his 5-year-old daughter, Harper -- both of whom he admired for their all-white attire. A post shared by David Beckham (@davidbeckham) on Feb 17, 2017 at 10:50am PST A post shared by David Beckham (@davidbeckham) on Feb 17, 2017 at 10:32am PST A post shared by David Beckham (@davidbeckham) on Feb 17, 2017 at 10:35am PST
